name: Truth of Bear
description:
STORY

Truth of bear is a walking simulator in which you meet a bear looking for its cub. You will have a little conversation until you find the bear cub. Let yourself be carried away by the sounds of the forest and live the experience.

FEATURES
  •  A  unique experience  in the forest.
  • Nice graphics and environment.
  • A game that makes you think and which push your thoughts on wild life.
NOTES 

This game was made during the GGJ 2021 on the theme : LOST & FOUND. Its goal is to raise public awareness about brown bear poaching.  If you want to help them, feel free to donate to WWF at this link: 

https://www.worldwildlife.org/species/brown-bear

CREDITS 
  • Saru Rezec - Bear graphics
  • Eder - forest graphics
